title: beautiful 1825 former Mill filled with amazing Architectural elements.
description: Welcome to this beautiful 1825 former Mill filled with amazing Architectural elements around every corner that seamlessly blend with all the modern amenities today! I cannot begin to imagine what the walls would tell us if they could speak! This immaculate & rare 2 story industrial loft style condo is perfectly located in the Heart of Downtown Phoenixville offering the Downtown Vibe! Charming Shops, Unique Restaurants, Fantastic Community Events, Historic Theater and Library, Walking/Biking Trail, Canal and Parks are within steps of this condo! You will immediately notice the 12’ ceilings & large windows providing an abundance of warm natural sunlight! Large floor to ceiling windows and exposed beams provide the perfect focal points of this unit! Sought after open floor plan that ensures this is a wonderful unit for entertaining. Beautifully refinished Hardwood flooring on the 1st level which features a coat closet, pantry, open & modern kitchen complete with granite counters, 42” cabinets, dishwasher & island with pendant lights overlooking the living area/dining area! This level overlooks to the lower level just filled with light! The lower level features a very comfortable living room, large open bedroom with closet, hall area/closet that could double as your in home office, very nice full bathroom complete with tub, tile surround, tile flooring, built in storage space, washer and dryer and a storage area. Exposed Beams, Exposed Brick Walls and Exposed ceilings throughout this unit are eye-catching! You will immediately know this is the place for you! This beautiful building houses a community room, perfect for entertaining your guests or relaxing with a book and a work-out room. The views from every window are amazing. There is an exterior deck for outside gathering that is shared with this community as well as 1 off street parking space. Secured building with elevator! Be sure to put this exquisite condo at the top of your MUST see list.

title: Pets OK! Amazing Architecture / NY Style Bldg / OPEN HOUSE TODAY!
description: Fall market is here and time to Fall in Love with this super Single and Available home that is ready for you to move in soon.  This 3 bedroom home offers many current upgrades so you can be assured it is ready for you to enjoy. The owners have very recently upgraded a new roof, new shutters, and exterior painting and painted most of the interior as well as installed newer carpets.  For starters relax and enjoy the sweet front porch area with room for a couple of rocking chairs to spend some downtime after a busy day. The floor plan lends itself to comfortable easy living with open flowing space in the living room, dining room, and totally redone kitchen.  The entry living area has wood parquet flooring and a huge floor to ceiling picture window that lets in so much light.  The dining room adjoins the living space and has a brand new Masterpiece Series Gliding Patio door with built in blinds to the lovely backyard.  Oh boy, now check out this marvelous white and bright newer kitchen.  Pretty plank laminate flooring to 42 inch Shaker cabinets with soft close drawers and cabinets, beautiful Frigidaire Gallery series stainless steel appliances, dishwasher 5 burner gas stove and a side by side refrigerator, recessed lighting, Quartz countertops with under mount sink and Subway tile backsplash, what’s not to love?  All the bedrooms and first floor areas have the high 5 ¼ inch trim molding, new light fixtures, some recessed lighting, 2 panel Farmhouse entry doors, 3 ceiling fans, one in each bedroom, and check out the remodeled hall bath.  Completely repainted, new baseboard and moldings, new exhaust fan, satin nickel fixtures, new shower head, new farmhouse sink and vanity with drawers, just so very nicely done.  The lower level family room has bead board walls with chair rail and there is storage space behind these walls in the crawl space, lots of windows and just a cozy room to snuggle up and watch the game or hang with your friends.  Just next to this is the utility and laundry room area with a good size laundry tub, a large picture window here to the back yard, and a convenient powder room off this area as well as an exit to the super rear fenced yard. There is a gas heater, central air, and a new Bradford White 40 gallon hot water heater.  The fenced rear yard is so very inviting with a huge shade tree in the middle for privacy and shade for these hot summer days.  Enjoy a nice day or evening in this outdoor space and bring the pets to allow them to roam free with the entire backyard fenced in.  Also, don’t forget there is a one car attached garage just off the family room with access there that is perfect for all your storage or car, need extra space, there is a shed in the rear yard that is also included.  One bonus option here is the 3rd floor walk up attic that is very large for storage or use your imagination and make this one an elegant main bedroom suite with a full bath down the road, so many other homes have done this in the area. This beautifully maintained home with all its charm is ready for you with flexible closing dates available. We think you will find this one the perfect place to enjoy and make it your forever home whether just starting out or maybe just downsizing. So very close to schools, shopping, the Farm Park with walking trails, many local nearby restaurants and of course very near all major routes and commuter train to the city.

title: 3X2 OPEN HOUSE THIS FRIDAY - APPLY TODAY
description: Fall market is here and time to Fall in Love with this super Single and Available home that is ready for you to move in soon.  This 3 bedroom home offers many current upgrades so you can be assured it is ready for you to enjoy. The owners have very recently upgraded a new roof, new shutters, and exterior painting and painted most of the interior as well as installed newer carpets.  For starters relax and enjoy the sweet front porch area with room for a couple of rocking chairs to spend some downtime after a busy day. The floor plan lends itself to comfortable easy living with open flowing space in the living room, dining room, and totally redone kitchen.  The entry living area has wood parquet flooring and a huge floor to ceiling picture window that lets in so much light.  The dining room adjoins the living space and has a brand new Masterpiece Series Gliding Patio door with built in blinds to the lovely backyard.  Oh boy, now check out this marvelous white and bright newer kitchen.  Pretty plank laminate flooring to 42 inch Shaker cabinets with soft close drawers and cabinets, beautiful Frigidaire Gallery series stainless steel appliances, dishwasher 5 burner gas stove and a side by side refrigerator, recessed lighting, Quartz countertops with under mount sink and Subway tile backsplash, what’s not to love?  All the bedrooms and first floor areas have the high 5 ¼ inch trim molding, new light fixtures, some recessed lighting, 2 panel Farmhouse entry doors, 3 ceiling fans, one in each bedroom, and check out the remodeled hall bath.  Completely repainted, new baseboard and moldings, new exhaust fan, satin nickel fixtures, new shower head, new farmhouse sink and vanity with drawers, just so very nicely done.  The lower level family room has bead board walls with chair rail and there is storage space behind these walls in the crawl space, lots of windows and just a cozy room to snuggle up and watch the game or hang with your friends.  Just next to this is the utility and laundry room area with a good size laundry tub, a large picture window here to the back yard, and a convenient powder room off this area as well as an exit to the super rear fenced yard. There is a gas heater, central air, and a new Bradford White 40 gallon hot water heater.  The fenced rear yard is so very inviting with a huge shade tree in the middle for privacy and shade for these hot summer days.  Enjoy a nice day or evening in this outdoor space and bring the pets to allow them to roam free with the entire backyard fenced in.  Also, don’t forget there is a one car attached garage just off the family room with access there that is perfect for all your storage or car, need extra space, there is a shed in the rear yard that is also included.  One bonus option here is the 3rd floor walk up attic that is very large for storage or use your imagination and make this one an elegant main bedroom suite with a full bath down the road, so many other homes have done this in the area. This beautifully maintained home with all its charm is ready for you with flexible closing dates available. We think you will find this one the perfect place to enjoy and make it your forever home whether just starting out or maybe just downsizing. So very close to schools, shopping, the Farm Park with walking trails, many local nearby restaurants and of course very near all major routes and commuter train to the city.

description:
CounterManagement.com/locust-street
Experience the charm and history of Rittenhouse square from the comforts of your own luxury apartment in one of Philadelphia’s most sought after neighborhoods. 1501 Locust is a luxury boutique building offering modern, opulent, and spacious apartments with stainless steel appliances, high ceilings, hardwood floors, and much more. title: Tons of Natural Light, Balcony, Cat Friendly, New Kitchen
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, garbage disposal and appliances.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

title: Pet Friendly Trinity with New Kitchen and Bathroom and Yard
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: This exceptionally clean and well cared for FIRST-FLOOR unit is movein
description:
This exceptionally clean and well cared for FIRST-FLOOR unit is move in ready. Imagine having no more steps to climb, everything you want is all on one level. Throw away your snow shovel, lawnmower, rakes, and shovels as all the exterior maintenance and repairs are provided by the association. This is a terrific opportunity for you to relocate to a safe, secure, and friendly community that is one of the best Senior Living Communities in the area. This exceptional FIRST- FLOOR property is well maintained with all flooring in great condition and has neutral, cared for painted walls (no picture holes) in move in condition. As you approach the house, it has a welcoming and weather protected entry. Note the optional crown molding throughout as you enter the hardwood floored foyer with nearby coat closet. The guest powder room with hardwood floors and pedestal sink is just off the foyer. Nearby, is your private laundry room with the included washer and dryer. The inviting kitchen with beautiful granite counter tops and bar height seating is the perfect place to enjoy the soothing, morning cup of coffee or set an array for a welcome dinner spread while entertaining. There are ample all wood cabinets to house all your culinary items in an organized manner. All the kitchen equipment, refrigerator is included, and convenience items are within easy reach. A doored pantry, within the kitchen, provides storage for non-perishables and other dining items. The open floor plan includes a hardwood floored large dining area that can accommodate formal dining room furniture for more expansive dining. Immediately adjacent to the dining area is a full-sized carpeted living room, with trayed ceiling, providing you opportunity to design/layout your furnishings in a number of configurations. The living room door leads to a private, quiet deck overlooking tree lined landscaping. Imagine yourself sitting there with a favorite book on a warm summer evening The FIRST-FLOOR master bedroom and bath are each well sized and have neutral tile and carpeted flooring to meet almost any color scheme you choose. Two large closets, one a walk in, adjoin the window lit master bedroom. The adjacent master bath has a nice sized soaking tub and separate full tiled shower with a two-sink vanity complement this great master bedroom/bath space. The extra-large, dry windowed basement has full insulation and is partially HVAC conditioned.

title: spacious 1 bedroom/1.5 bath end-unit condo in a walk-to everything loc
description:
Exceptional, carefree living right in the heart of desirable Ardmore! Originally built by renowned Main Line builder B.J. Drueding Builders, this is a rare opportunity to rent a fabulous, spacious 1 bedroom/1.5 bath end-unit condo in a walk-to everything location. Enter through the marble foyer to gleaming Brazilian Cherry hardwood floors that flow throughout. You'll enjoy effortless entertaining with a gourmet kitchen, designed with Brookhaven cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Adjacent to the kitchen is the dining room, ready for your family and guests. French doors lead to an intimate flagstone patio and garden to enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The living room is spacious and airy, highlighted by a slate surround wood-burning fireplace, built-in cabinetry, shelving and bay window. The bright and spacious master suite is complete with walk-in closet, luxurious master bath with limestone vanity and large seamless glass shower. Special upgrades include all new energy efficient windows and sliding glass doors, updated HVAC, two new patios with exterior lighting, overhead cooling fans, new outside landscaping and hardwood floors throughout. For your convenience, you'll also find a laundry area with stackable washer and dryer. This well-situated condo includes two designated parking spaces, one in the enclosed garage, as well as a large storage unit. Enjoy the quiet and convenience of your new home as it is located within walking distance from Lower Merion HS, Suburban Square, Trader Joes and the Ardmore Farmer's Market. The nearby Ardmore train station provides Septa and Amtrak service to Center City, NY or Washington D.C. so that you may indulge in the best of the suburbs and easy access to the city.

title: Irresistable 3 bed 2 bath Bella Vista townhome with garage parking!
description:
705 Pemberton Street unit 711R – Available Now – 3 Bed 2 bath townhome with Garage
Amazing Bella Vista Location!! This three Bedroom, Two Full Baths Home with Garage Parking is available for rent.
Located in the Carriage Mews Condo Development this 1990 built townhome is tucked away off of Pemberton Street. Enter through the private gates into a serene shared courtyard with mature plantings including Japanese Maple trees and hostas. The first floor has a living room with a wood burning fireplace, beautiful wood parquet flooring, a mechanical/storage closet , a custom floor to ceiling bookcase, and french doors that look onto the garden courtyard. There is a very large eat in kitchen with a gas stove, a custom artisan tile backsplash, tons of countertop space and storage, a terra cotta tile floor, and a durable Corian countertop. Finally, there is a deep hall closet for storage that was a half bath prior. On the second floor, the study has a wood burning fireplace, shelving, oak hardwood flooring, and large windows allowing natural light to pour in. Also, there is a hallway full bath with additional storage space, and a washer and dryer
and a generous sized bedroom as well. The third floor includes a second bedroom, a full hallway bath with a skylight, and a small third bedroom with sliders leading to the East facing deck overlooking the tree tops and note there is the ability to add a roof deck also.
The garage is located directly to the right of the entrance gate and has some storage space as well.
The home is located in the Meredith catchment, a National Blue Ribbon school, and is a half a block down from Cianfrani Park, a neighborhood gem. Fantastic restaurants like Fiorella, Bistro La Minette, and Kalaya Thai Kitchen just a few blocks away as well as close proximity to the highways.

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available September 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.
